messages.body: $TSLA $NVDA "An iPhone moment" with Nvidia chips going into each one. http://www.businessinsider.com/fidelity-portfolio-manager-tesla-auto-market-growth-2017-8

links.title: Fidelity portfolio manager: Test driving a Tesla was an 'iPhone moment'
links.description: Sonu Kalra, a portfolio manager with Fidelity's Blue Chip Growth Fund, spoke to Henry Blodget about Tesla, and how his first time test driving one of their cars was an "iPhone moment" for him. He also discusses how Tesla's new Model 3 could take a considerable chunk of market share, and talks about how the company can become profitable over time.

messages.body: $TSLA issued $1.8B in debt to finance model 3 on Friday. Junk rating 8 year unsecured @ 5.25% http://trde.it/2fzz4J2

links.title: Tesla is set to raise $1.8 billion in its junk-bond sale to fund the Model 3
links.description: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Bond investors on Friday were poised to give a $1.8 billion boost toInc.'s balance sheet by snapping up the electric car maker's first foray into the U.S. junk bond market, where yield-hungry investors have raced to lock in relatively higher returns.

links.title: The Real Lockup Expiry Will Take Place After Snap's Q217 Results
links.description: While the initial IPO float of Snap, Inc. ( SNAP) was only 180 million shares, the dual lockup expires on July 31st and August 14th bring more than 1.1 billion additional shares available for sale.
